courseDetails.title: Diversity At Workplace
courseDetails.shortDescription: If you want to position your business for success, hire a diverse workforce.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Diversity in the workplace is vital for employees because it manifests itself in building a great reputation for the company, leading to increased profitability and opportunities for workers.

Workplace diversity is important within the organization as well as outside.

Diversity in the workplace means that a company’s workforce includes people of varying gender, age, religion, race, ethnicity, cultural background, sexual orientation, religion, languages, education, abilities, etc.

Why is workplace diversity so important?

In the modern, globally connected society and market, workplace diversity is becoming a necessity rather than a banner companies wave to show their commitment to embracing differences.

Most of the modern companies can sell their products all over the world, reaching many different groups of people. In order to successfully create, present and sell their products in this global market, companies need a diversified workforce.

So, in this class our Learning Objectives are:

  • Understand what diversity and its related terms mean

  • Be able to identify your stereotypes

  • Understand what terms are politically correct and which are not, and why

  • Be familiar with the four cornerstones of diversity

  • Develop a technique for dealing with inappropriate behavior

  • Develop a management style to encourage diversity

  • Know what to do if you or one of your employees feels discriminated against

So, shall we get started? I wish you a happy learning!

courseDetails.title: Arabic Alphabet For Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Arabic Language: Learn to Pronounce & Write Arabic Alphabet, and Read Arabic Words
courseDetails.longDescription:
السلام عليكم


In this Course, we will learn Arabic Alphabet from Alef to Yaa


Firstly, we will take general view for all letters,

then, we will learn each letter in details :

How we Pronounce it ?   &   How we write it ?

and some words with this letter, so we can read Arabic Words.


Finally, you will take a test, so you can evaluate yourself in Arabic after finishing this Course.


By finishing this Course, you will be able to :

  • Pronounce Arabic Alphabet.

  • Write Arabic Alphabet.

  • Read Arabic Words.


This Course is for :

  • Arabic Learners.

  • Beginner Students who don't know any thing about Arabic Language.

  • Students who want to learn Arabic Alphabet.

  • Students who want to be able to read Arabic Words


Course Requirements :

  • Pen and Paper.

  • Focus.

  • Do the Homework after each Lesson.


So let's get started..





Who is Hassan Academy ?

Native Arabic Speaker, With over 12+ years of experience in Arabic Language.

Hands-on experience creating development courses and activities modeled on goal attainment and student-centered instruction, delivering engaging lessons focused on the interests and needs of students. Knowledgeable of standard instruction principles, classroom management styles, and approaches to teaching Modern Standard Arabic to English speakers.

We will add value by helping you learning how to listen to Arabic and read Arabic with true pronunciation as fast as possible.

courseDetails.title: Dein eigener Podcast - Live in 24 Stunden!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Als Online Unternehmer Tausende gratis Leads gewinnen - lerne Best Practices vom Erfolgs-Podcast!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Podcast wird immer beliebter und immer mehr Menschen hören Podcast. Über 4 Millionen Menschen hören in Deutschland sogar täglich eine Podcast Episode, Tendenz steigend. Dies bietet enorme Möglichkeiten auch für Dich! Nutze Podcast für Content Marketing, so baust Du Dir eine treue Hörerschaft auf mit einem hohen Maß an Bindung zu den Hörern.

Hast Du Deinen Podcast richtig aufgebaut, bietet er Dir eine ideale Werbefläche und zwar unkompliziert, authentisch und ohne jegliche Produktionskosten. Ohne Werbekosten geht Deine Message direkt ins Ohr Deiner Zielgruppe.

Podcast Hörer möchten ihr eigenes Wissen in bestimmten Themenbereichen vertiefen oder Neues zu lernen und verweilen lange. Neben der Wissensvermittlung spielt beim Podcast auch Unterhaltung eine große Rolle.

Mit einem eigenen Podcast kannst Du als Unternehmer, Deine eigene persönliche Marke aufbauen, als Experte noch besser wahrgenommen werden sowie treue Kunden und Interessenten für Dein bestehendes Geschäft gewinnen. Oder der Podcast ist die Geschäftsidee an sich, denn mit einem guten Podcast alleine kannst Du schon viel Geld verdienen.

In diesem Kurs lernst Du, Podcasting macht richtig Spaß. Du lernst, wie Du einen Podcast richtig aufbaust, von Deinem Warum, über die Themenwahl, Redaktionsplan, welche Technik bis hin zur praktischen Umsetzung.

Wir gehen zusammen durch die Tools und zeigen Dir wie Du eine Podcast Episode innerhalb 15 Minuten in guter Qualität hochlädst und welche Auswertungen Du Dir regelmäßig anschauen sollst.

Dieser Kurs besteht aus kurzen und leicht verständlichen Lektionen. Wenn Du dem Kurs folgst, wirst Du schnell in der Umsetzung sein und mit Deinem eigenen Podcast durchstarten.

Viel Spaß beim Zuschauen!
targetAudiences: Online Unternehmer, die mit einem eigenen Podcast mehr Leads generieren wollen
Unternehmer, die mit einem eigenen Podcast neue Kunden gewinnen möchten
Anfänger, die ihren eigenen Podcast erstellen und veröffentlichen möchten
Podcaster, die Tipps für Qualität und Schnelligkeit bei der Episodenerstellung benötigen
Podcaster, die ihren Podcast noch erfolgreicher machen möchten

courseDetails.title: HVAC Ductwork Quantity Take off for Quantity Surveyors
courseDetails.shortDescription: HVAC, Duct, Take off, Estimation, Quantity Surveying, Length, Area, Weight, SMACNA, POMI, AUTOCAD, Excel, Template, MEP
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to this course on HVAC Duct Quantity Take off.

HVAC stands for Heating, Cooling, Air Conditioning. It forms a part of MEP Services.

Ducts are used as a medium for transmission of air from the equipment's to different rooms in a building.

Accurate estimation of DUCT quantities is critical for an effective cost management of a construction project.

In this course you will understand how to take off the HVAC duct quantity using different unit of measurements.

You will be able to estimate the duct measurement by length, area and weight by the end of this course.

Excel templates for all length, area and weight measurements are separately explained and the templates are also available for download.

These templates can be used in your professional life.

This course also includes the basics of ductworks, difference between Air Handling Unit & Fresh Air Handling Unit.

POMI Standards for Duct measurement is also included as an additional lecture.

There is also a lecture on AUTOCAD tips that can be helpful for your estimation purpose.

SMACNA Documents for weight estimation is also explained and this document is downloadable in this course.

A Sample drawing is also included for practice purpose.

Construction professionals and enthusiasts will definitely enjoy this course and learn something new.


So enroll for this course without wasting time and have fun learning new concepts and ideas.

courseDetails.title: Atlassian Confluence Masterclass for Project Managers
courseDetails.shortDescription: Confluence: Complete & Comprehensive course on the Cloud version of Atlassian's Confluence for Project Management
courseDetails.longDescription:
Confluence is a powerful enterprise collaboration tool that brings people, knowledge, and ideas together in a shared workspace, so you can do your best work. Through this course "Atlassian Confluence Masterclass", you will learn how to use Confluence to transform the way your team works.

This course is structured to guide you through all the key aspects of managing and using Confluence.

Whether you’re new to Confluence, training your teammates, or ready to take your Confluence skills to the next level, this guide covers everything from the basics to in-depth best practices.

The course will start with setting up your own Confluence account and you will be introduced to all the key features of Confluence in subsequent lectures. With each lecture, you will learn important concepts such as creating engaging content, sharing information, and engaging users to collaborate in real time with each other.

By the end of the course, you will be able to create your pages, blogs and share the same with your team members to engage & collaborate.

Please find below the course structure for your quick reference:

1. Brief overview of Confluence

2. Setting up your own Confluence account

3. Applications of Confluence

4. Navigate through the Confluence interface, spaces, user profile & settings

5. Introduction to all key features of Confluence: Spaces, Pages, Blogs & Comments

6. Create Content: Spaces, Pages, Blog Posts

7. Master Spaces: Create different types of Spaces: Team, Personal & Project Spaces; Delete & Archive Spaces

8. Master Pages & Blog Posts

9. Invite users to collaborate

10. Confluence Editor: Usage & features

11. Add links, files, macros and mentions

12. Space & Page Blueprints

13. Content Permissions, Labels & Restrictions

14. Watch Content

15. Keyboard Shortcuts

16. Confluence Administration & User Settings

Course enrollment grants you lifetime access, with no expiration, to all the course lectures. In addition, you’ll also receive 1-on-1 support for any questions or uncertainties that come up. And this all comes with a money-back guarantee. You have nothing to lose and so much knowledge to gain.


Just ask the students who’ve already taken this course:

★★★★★ "A great step by step guide through Atlassian-Confluence. Menu items are explored and explained. Alternative routes to doing the same actions are also explained. Examples are worked through at a very good pace and the videos are not overwhelming. There is no homework, which means that you can actually focus on soaking in the material. Feel free to stop, edit your own confluence and explore, without the pressure of an assignment behind it. I thought everything in the video was helpful and even learned a couple new tricks on how to structure my spaces. There are a variety of use-case scenarios that give you an idea of how to use this tool in different ways (which happens to be my favorite part). Useful demonstrations on layouts, permissions, status changes, drop down menus and more. Confluence is a Canvass that can be used as a great communication platform. You have many tools at your disposal and this course covers that arsenal. Great work and Thank You."

-David Fai


★★★★★ "This is a great course on Confluence's latest version. Really useful with clear & crisp explanations! Highly recommended. Thanks to the tutor."

- Reena Shah


★★★★★ "I needed a refresher on Confluence capabilities before starting a project. This course presents all the relevant features nicely. It is good for any type of end user."

-Iasan Montac


★★★★★ "The course is well planned and was impressed with instructor's knowledge of the subject & the detailed explanations. I am so glad that I choose this course."

- Umesh Bansal


★★★★★ "To the point. I like it when the instructor is focused on teaching the topic and not wasting time here and there."

-Rick
targetAudiences: Anyone who is looking for a powerful team collaboration tool
Anyone is who is new to Confluence & is looking to learn and use the latest version of it
Anyone who is already using Confluence and wants to take their Confluence skills to the next level, this guide covers everything from the basics to in-depth best practices.
Anyone who is looking to understand all features and concepts of Confluence and get up to speed with using and administering them for their teams

courseDetails.title: Comunicazione efficace - Diventa bravo a comunicare
courseDetails.shortDescription: I 10 Passi per distinguersi in tutte le situazioni lavorative e personali
courseDetails.longDescription:
Livello: base

Avere buone abilità comunicative è il più importante vantaggio che tu possa mai sviluppare per il tuo successo nella vita. Ogni giorno tra situazioni lavorative e personali (Riunioni, presentazioni, cene galanti o colloqui di lavoro) dovremo sempre essere pronti a comunicare nel modo giusto.

Coloro che sviluppano forti capacità di comunicazione ottengono posti di lavoro e promozioni e spesso salgono ai più alti livelli di leadership nelle aziende, nei governi e nella vita quotidiana. Senza contare che già da studenti, quando si è abili a comunicare, si diventa dei bravi allievi che l'insegnante non può fare a meno di notare.

Invece, le persone che non riescono a sviluppare capacità di comunicazione spesso finiscono per essere fraintesi, hanno situazioni lavorative e private che non riescono a risolvere perché non sono bravi a comunicare. Questo percorso è indicato per costruire le basi fondamentali per una comunicazione chiara, sicura e coincisa (in meno di 3 ore!)

Il corso è progettato per tutti coloro che vogliono migliorare la propria comunicazione e costruire delle basi solide per influenzare e rimanere impresso POSITIVAMENTE nella mente degli altri.

L'approccio per la maggior parte del tempo sarà discorsivo come se fosse una chiacchierata tra amici e senza mai utilizzare esempi accademici pesanti e difficili da comprendere. Solo quello che ti servirà per comprendere differenza tra un messaggio scadente ed una comunicazione efficace.

Attenzione: non è un corso esaustivo su tutto quello che riguarda la comunicazione e non è consigliato per chi ha già esperienza in ambito comunicativo.

Organizzazione del corso:

Ci sono 10 sezioni fondamentali denominate Analizza la tua comunicazione, Il cuore del messaggio, Organizza i pensieri, Frasi coincise, Pause efficaci, Riempitivi, Ascolta per comunicare, Comunicazione non verbale, Parole ammorbidenti (bonus) e Messa in pratica. Guarda le sezioni/lezioni del corso completo per maggiori dettagli. Grazie ;-)

Ecco alcune delle cose che imparerai a fare in questo corso:

  • Come evitare i falsi miti della comunicazione e distinguersi quando parliamo

  • Differenza tra essenza del messaggio e mettere un punto nelle conversazioni

  • La semplice e ordinata "Tecnica dei tre secchi"

  • Dare ritmo alle parole con le pause appropriate senza essere lagnosi

  • E tanto altro...

Ci sono 2 modi pratici per seguire l'intero percorso:

Seguire l'intero corso in ordine come lo trovi.

  1. Seguire l'intero corso in ordine e poi fare "zapping" da una lezione all'altra in base a quello che vuoi approfondire.

  2. Puoi andare direttamente all'argomento che ti interessa di più e trovare direttamente le risposte ai tuoi dubbi o domande.

Tutto in poco più di due ore per dare la possibilità a chi è impegnato per lavoro di acquisire in poco tempo le basi per una comunicazione efficace.

Ricordati che la comunicazione efficace è un'abilità importante per qualsiasi lavoro ed è essenziale per la vita stessa. Senza capacità di comunicazione efficace, non avremmo modo di funzionare come esseri umani nella nostra società moderna.

Per qualsiasi domanda ci vediamo nel mio sito o scrivimi via email.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri migliorare la comunicazione e valorizzare la propria immagine quando si relaziona con gli altri

courseDetails.title: Mastering The Interview
courseDetails.shortDescription: To present yourself well in the interview and to make a good impression, you should master the job interview.
courseDetails.longDescription:
The interview is one of the key elements of the job search process.

As with any skill, we can get better at it with preparation and practice. So in this course, you will explore how to prepare for an interview and become familiar with the types of questions to expect, as well as the questions you should think about asking.

Some people are natural at selling themselves to hiring managers. Others aren’t. Either way, you’ve already put in a ton of effort, so you might as well take steps to rock your interview, right?

Turn Talents into Keywords Your talents are the best place to begin thinking about job search targets. Make a list of your interests, natural talents, academic strengths and skills you have learned through your experiences.

Review specific job postings that match your job titles to learn about employer expectations, desired candidate qualifications, typical duties and required skills or training. If some of the job titles do not represent a good match for you, eliminate them and replace them with others that you are discovering through your search.

So, in this course you will:

  • Understand the different types of interview questions and how to prepare to answer them.

  • Learn the most effective ways to prepare for an interview, including how to present themselves professionally.

  • Develop expertise at expressing themselves effectively.

  • Know how to ask for feedback following an interview.

So with that said, I wish you a happy learning and see you inside!
tags: Competenze per i colloqui di lavoro

courseDetails.title: Basics of Proofreading
courseDetails.shortDescription: A proofreader ensures content is free of typographical, grammatical, spelling, punctuation, syntax, & other such errors.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Proofreaders are normally the members of the publishing team that make sure that documents look and read their best before they are sent to print. Along with being able to recognize errors in written materials, proofreaders must be able to correctly mark the documents for corrections.


However, nowadays, with the help of freelancer marketplaces anyone can become a proofreader and offer their services online.


Proofreaders can charge around $20-$50 per hour

Proofreaders can earn per year around $50K working part time

Proofreaders can work from home or from anywhere in the world


If you learn how to become a proofreader, you will enjoy more:


FREEDOM – to be home with your kids, leave your 9-to-5 job, and work with who you want, when you want, where you want

FLEXIBILITY – to work when it fits best in your schedule

FINANCIAL SECURITY – side hustles can help you to stop living paycheck-to-paycheck, get rid of debt, take family vacations, and have extra fun money


Plus, proofreading is something you naturally do for free anyway. Why not get paid for those incredible eagle eyes you were blessed with?


So, if you’re excited to get started, I will see you inside!


Just click on “Enroll Now” button and I’ll see you inside!
targetAudiences: This course is for you if you’re willing to start a career in proofreading and copyediting.

Learning Adobe Portfolio is Not only for Experienced users, but also everyone else. Because when you have master Adobe Portfolio, you get around your profile and easily install applications to your computer versus having to get someone else to do it for you which can cost both time and money!

In short, a good understanding of Adobe Portfolio is tremendously beneficial.

Now, in this course, we'll go far beyond that. By the end of it, you'll have gained complete proficiency in Adobe Portfolio even if you're currently a complete beginner!


THAT’S RIGHT...NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE OR KNOWLEDGE IS REQUIRED!

You don’t need any previous experience or knowledge to take this course. In fact, all you need is a desire to learn and master Adobe Portfolio.

This is not one of those courses that will throw too much at you at once and cause you to get overwhelmed. This is a course that you’ll not only learn so much from, but also enjoy the journey as you’re learning (which is a very important part of the learning process)

The course will take you by the hand and teach you everything you need to know step by step and even put your knowledge to practice immediately by showing you how to setup an account in Adobe Portfolio and How to Download the Adobe Portfolio Application.

On top of this, you will also get my continuous support as well to make sure you’re successful with my course.
